items.title: Charlie Kirk's killing: A dangerous moment for America?

items.title: NIOT develops indigenous fishing boat-based real-time ocean observation system
items.summary: NIOT has planned to conduct systematic pre- and post-monsoon surveys along five key river mouths along the Tamil Nadu coast

items.title: After Poland, Russian drone breaches Romanian airspace during attack on neighbouring Ukraine
items.summary: Defence Minister Ionut Mosteanu said the F-16 pilots came close to taking down the drone as it was flying very low before it left national airspace toward Ukraine

items.title: Nearly 60% of India’s outward FDI goes to ‘tax havens’, reflecting strategic potential of these countries
items.summary: An analysis of RBI data by The Hindu shows that nearly 56% of such investments in 2024-25 were in low tax jurisdictions such as Singapore, Mauritius, UAE, the Netherlands, U.K. and Switzerland

items.title: Man arrested for murdering wife in Medavakkam
Maintaining law and order is among top priorities of government, says Andhra CM
items.summary: The police personnel should keep them updated with evolving legal aspects, says Naidu, adding that crimes done under the guise of politics will not be tolerated

items.title: Andhra Health Minister defends PPP model, refutes Jagan’s ‘privatisation’ claim on medical colleges
items.summary: Satya Kumar Yadav says NDA inherited unfinished works and heavy financial burden on 17 proposed medical colleges

items.title: The realpolitik of a reel hero
items.summary: For years, Vijay has been and remains the top-paid artiste in Kollywood and possibly among the highest-paid film stars in the country. His fans form legions ready to take up the cudgels for him, quite belligerently at that, at the mere sign of criticism — either of his movies or of the actor himself

items.title: RWAs to receive training in monsoon crisis response from Chennai Corporation
School students visit CMC campus in Ranipet
items.summary: Students interacted with doctors, nurses, and medical staff who patiently explained their roles and the importance of compassionate patient care.

items.title: HIV strains in India resist some top broadly neutralising antibodies
items.summary: Researchers have found that Indian strains of HIV were most effectively neutralised by bNAbs targeting the virus’s V3 glycan while antibodies aimed at the V1/V2 apex of the viral spike protein were far less effective

items.title: Tiruvannamalai Corporation issues eviction notices to houses on encroached land in Arunachala Hills
items.summary: As per a study, the Revenue Department found that there were around 3,535 illegal settlements in the hills, especially along the Girivalam path for many years.

items.title: Vellore police return missing phones back to its owners
items.summary: The cybercrime team has been monitoring the missing mobile phone handsets through their IMEI number at periodical intervals.

items.title: Three persons killed after bus and van collide near Chengam
items.summary: Police said the van driver Mani failed to notice a bus coming in the opposite direction on the stretch, and hit the bus, which was proceeding towards Tiruvannamalai town with around 30 commuters

items.title: Investment and digital arrest scams top the list of cybercrimes
items.summary: The upward trend is clear when comparing the number of investment scams reported between January and August in 2024 and 2025.

items.title: Seven held for killing farmer in Ranipet over temple dispute
items.summary: Arrested persons were lodged at Central Prison in Vellore.

items.title: Small farms are more productive than large farms, finds study
items.summary: Study by IIT Bombay and the University of Hyderabad reveals productivity in India’s semi-arid tropics depends on access to inputs and markets

items.title: Stalin appeals to Central govt. to confer Bharat Ratna on Ilaiyaraaja
items.summary: The State government felicitated composer Ilaiyaraaja for serving 50 years in the film industry. The London Philharmonic Orchestra performed Ilaiyaraaja’s Valiant Symphony I and his popular numbers including Kanne Kalaimane

items.title: Tripura Police recover ₹7 crore in bank fraud case; cashier arrested
items.summary: The money was drained out through cheques forging the signature of municipal corporation Commissioner D.K. Chakma from a branch of the UCO Bank

items.title: Will ensure city glitters before Diwali: Delhi CM

items.summary: The accused allegedly posted objectionable remarks against the Quran and Prophet Muhammad on social media on September 12, prompting a large crowd to gather outside the police station and raise slogans

items.title: How has Gen Z uprising forced changes in Nepal? | Explainer
items.summary: What led to the protests? How are they different from previous agitations? What does the young generation want? Did pro-monarchy supporters play a role in the violence? Does the Constitution allow Parliament to be dissolved because of protests? What happens to the interim government?

items.title: What are the enhanced powers of Foreigners Tribunals? | Explainer
items.summary: What do the Rules of the Immigration and Foreigners Act, 2025 specify? How many tribunals are operational in Assam? How have their roles changed? What is the order on Sri Lankan Tamils in India?”

items.title: Odisha Information Commission debars RTI applicant from filing applications for a year
items.summary: Observing that the applicant was seeking excess information, often repetitive, the Information Commissioner capped filing of number of applications at 12 in a calendar year for the applicant

items.title: Explosion in Madrid from suspected gas leak injures 25
items.summary: Firefighter chief Javier Romero said that firefighters pulled four people from the rubble after the explosion occurred on the ground floor of a three-story building

items.title: Sébastien Lecornu | Macron’s lieutenant
items.summary: France’s President has chosen his long-time ally to lead the government and win the support of a fractious Parliament where no party has a majority

items.title: Educating young voters
items.summary: Merely having a candidate to vote for is not enough. Maturity comes from understanding democracy as a dynamic system

items.title: PwD representation in Central workforce stuck around 1% for over a decade: DoPT data
items.summary: RPwD Act, 2016 hiked PwD quota to 4%, but less than 1.2% of Central government employees are disabled; DoPT data does not clarify whether all these PwD employees were hired for reserved posts only

items.title: Charlie Kirk | Death of a culture crusader
items.summary: The American right-wing activist, who was killed in Utah on September 10, had promoted conservatism in a Trumpist avatar, creating a heady cocktail of MAGA populism and Christian nationalism that he showcased through public debates with campus liberals
